DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate whether program behavioral cognitive procedure emotional control , assertive training , produce well-being improvement quality life healthy volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy volunteer , present neurologic psychiatric disorder , 18 year old , gender , select , medical examination , participate study . In randomized controlled trial , volunteer submit session muscle relaxation ( autogenic method ) , progressive self-focus meditation , cognitive-behavioral training self-control negative feeling . They also train determine goal determine step reach ( plan action ) .The volunteer apply strategy control emotional behavior improve interpersonal relationship . Anxiety depression score determine use Beck self evaluation scale ( BDI BAI ) ; quality life determine use WHO-QOL inventory Ryff Scale use measure Psychological Well-Being .
DOC.criteria: Healthy people , without neurological psychiatry disorder , accord result medical examination 18 year old high school degree Severe neurological psychiatric disorder
